definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
Wong Kar-wai (1956-), Hong Kong film director
Wang Jiarui (1949-), PRC politician and diplomat, from 2006 head of CCP central committee's external affairs department 對外聯絡部|对外联络部[dui4 wai4 lian2 luo4 bu4]

sentences.english: That's John. He lives with the Wang family.
sentences.chinese: 那是约翰，他和王家的人住一起。

sentences.english: The last one arrived to end is a child from family Wang.
sentences.chinese: 获得最后一名的是王家的孩子。

sentences.english: To show the wangs mobilization, jade was XiaoRong with a slingshot, said he was like a bad guy.
sentences.chinese: 到王家动员秀玉时，却被晓荣用弹弓打，说他像坏人。

sentences.english: Uncle Gen arrived at Old Wang's house to see everything was in a mess.
sentences.chinese: 根叔到老王家时，正乱成一锅粥。

sentences.english: Home Wang is sunken not improvement, the problem is on a poor word.
sentences.chinese: 王家凹不起色，问题就在一个穷字上。

sentences.english: He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all his substance
sentences.chinese: 立他作王家之主，掌管他一切所有的。

sentences.english: Long to set out the next day, but the wangs are closed.
sentences.chinese: 第二天长文来迎亲，但王家大门紧闭。

sentences.english: The Wangs consider their son a black sheep.
sentences.chinese: 王家的人认为他们的儿子没有出息。

sentences.english: Not only were the Wangs a family of means, but the Wang women were notoriously fertile.
sentences.chinese: 王家不仅富有，而且王氏的女性都子嗣旺盛。

sentences.english: From then on, the Wangs never had a day's peace.
sentences.chinese: 从那以后，王家就再没有过一天的安生日子。

sentences.english: Congratulations from the entire Wang family. We wish you joy and happiness in your little daughter.
sentences.chinese: 王家全体成员恭喜您们生了千金，敬祝幸福快乐。

sentences.english: Person of Wang Jiaao whole village goes money to give thing, bring back to life A Xia.
sentences.chinese: 王家凹全村人出钱出物，救活了阿霞。

sentences.english: Wangjiawaizi gold deposit occurs in Lower Proterozoic opimetamorphic rock series.
sentences.chinese: 王家崴子金矿床赋存于辽南古元古代浅变质岩系中。

sentences.english: The sweepings from the cracks in our Wang family's floor are enough to last you a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 把我王家的地缝子扫一扫，就够你们过一辈子呢。

sentences.english: Rescue effort for 32 miners in crucial phase .
sentences.chinese: 王家岭剩余32名矿工的救助进入关键时刻。

sentences.english: She also held talks with Head of the International Department of the CPC Central Committee Wang Jiarui.
sentences.chinese: 她还与中共中央对外联络部部长王家瑞举行了会谈。

definition: the Zhou family (household, firm etc)/Jow-Ga Kung Fu - Martial Art
learned person/expert in a certain field/abbr. for 大方之家[da4 fang1 zhi1 jia1]
the Hong family (household)/Hung Gar Kung Fu - Martial Art
eldest grandson/the eldest son of one's eldest son
the Korean Yi or Lee Dynasty (1392-1910)
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
a member of the same clan/a distant relative with the same family name
